Shivah::

Shivah arrived to Perceptor's Office, before Shivah did or said 
something, doors opened and Perceptor appeared sat in a chair "So..." 
said the blind bot "A new bot is come in in our base Shivah?"

"Yes" said the Dragon-male while he came in and intived Ender to do 
the same with a movement of his hand "He's new here..."

"Let him speak, Shivah" said the second in rank, after say that 
Perceptor asked to Ender "What're your name and what are you 
fuctions?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>     "I see.  I hope there isn't anything too bad going on.  When 
unchecked, 
> war can get rather messy."  He walks along in robot mode behind 
Shivah.
